titleStmt.title: Whereas by occasion of the backwardness of many of His Majesties tenants farmers and debtors in payment of the rents and other debts due and payable by them ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Ormonde.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Crooke ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the castle of Kilkenny, the 11th day of September, 1667.
